original_text: People who are like that will live in a safe place. Danger will not reach them among the high rocks. They will always have food to eat, and plenty of water to drink. People who are like that will live in a safe place. Danger will not reach them among the high rocks. They will always have food to eat, and plenty of water to drink. People who are like that will live in a safe place. Danger will not reach them among the high rocks. They will always have food to eat, and plenty of water to drink. People who are like that will live in a safe place.
korean_text: 그는 높은 곳에 거하리니 견고한 바위가 그의 요새가 되며 그의 양식은 공급되고 그의 물은 끊어지지 아니하리라

sentences.original_text: People who are like that
will live in a safe place
Danger will not reach them
among the high rocks
They will always have food to eat
sentences.korean_translation: 그들은 항상 먹을 음식이 있을 것이다

sentences.original_text: and plenty of water to drink
sentences.korean_translation: 그리고 마실 충분한 물이 있을 것이다
